 ```plaintext
 __  __       
|  \/  |_   _ 
| |\/| | | | |
| |  | | |_| |
|_|  |_|\__, |
        |___/ 
 _   _ _   _ _  ______        _  __                                
| | | | | | | |/ / __ )      | |/ /___ _   _ _ __ ___   __ _ _ __  
| |_| | |_| | ' /|  _ \ _____| ' // _ \ | | | '_ ` _ \ / _` | '_ \ 
|  _  |  _  | . \| |_) |_____| . \  __/ |_| | | | | | | (_| | |_) |
|_| |_|_| |_|_|\_\____/      |_|\_\___|\__, |_| |_| |_|\__,_| .__/ 
                                       |___/                |_|    
```

### Introduction
I'm using **HHKB Pro 2** with **YDKB HHKB BLE Mod**.

If you're in the same situation as mine, please continue reading.

The **HHKB_BLE.BIN** file is generated by [ydkb.io](http://ydkb.io).

### Keyboard Layouts
* **Colemak Keyboard Layouts**
![Layer0](/layers_pic/layer0.jpg)
<p align="center">Layer0</p>
<p align="center">This layer is the default layer.</p>

* **QWERTY Keyboard Layouts**
![Layer1](/layers_pic/layer1.jpg)
<p align="center">Layer1</p>

* **Tricks Layouts**
![Layer2](/layers_pic/layer2.jpg)
<p align="center">Layer2</p>

* **Function Keys Layouts**
![Layer3](/layers_pic/layer3.jpg)
<p align="center">Layer3</p>

You can visit this [website](http://ydkb.io/?hhkb_ble-0#) and modify your configuration based on mine.
